summary: brie and taylor shipname should be baelor
question: brie and taylor shipname should be baelor
answer:
Doesn’t that violate the rules for portmanteaus? 😊😅🤣🤣🤣📝

Also, by using “Braylor” (I use it for search and tag functions, but the ship is growing by the day), it can stay buried when “Me!” or anything with Brendon is done, like with how “Babe” buried the babe.net gay as hell article. Thanks to a mutual/anon that pointed that out.

summary: Okay but Taylor should befriend Brie Larson because Brie was getting the most stupid shit over cap marvel. People called her a...
question: Okay but Taylor should befriend Brie Larson because Brie was getting the most stupid shit over cap marvel. People called her a Nazi for talking to a CHILD
answer:
Yeah, I fundamentally agree. I’d move to add Madonna to the clique too because people currently seem to be Big Mad that she’s daring to be a woman in the public eye who’s aged past 50 and not died quietly in a corner.

Can Taylor, Brie and Madonna form a club of women who I love, who the world is shitting on for absolutely no good reason?

summary: I believe the reason why there are so many stans for Carol Danvers and Maria Rambeau.....
body:
I believe the reason why there are so many stans for Carol Danvers and Maria Rambeau…..

is due to the fact that they have everything it takes to be a wholesome, but also ass kicking, WLW hero family.

Yes, Captain Marvel could be the first legitimate LGBT hero for mcu onscreen (heavy on the COULD be, the way this industry is set up) but why not go further? The background is already set for them, with an immense amount of history to delve into. The chemistry bewteen these two is undeniable. The chemistry between Carol, Maria and Monica is the most adorbs. Maria isn’t all in on the galactic fight, but she isn’t sidelined either so seeing her eyes open to the universe is a draw. Having Carol get reacquainted with Earth and her original self with the help of her family seems more genuine.

If Carol is paired with anyone else there is none of this. I love a good single WLW story but the dynamic these two have is just so easy to recieve. It gives me the warm and fuzzies. The familial aspect. The questions unanswered. The old Carol vs Vers.The “once I was lost but now I am found” storyline has so much potential………

Me on a ramble. Just in my thoughts…..slow day at work 💞💞

summary: I like the people who hate Brie and who claim she’s destroying Marvel/she single handedly ruined Endgame (like these are things...
body:
I like the people who hate Brie and who claim she’s destroying Marvel/she single handedly ruined Endgame (like these are things people have legit said).

I mean, man do I stan myself one powerful lady! XD Marvel has been building for over twenty films and has a massive cast of various famous actors, yet Brie is apparently enough to bring the whole thing down just by existing! Same for her ruining Endgame. She’s got the shortest amount of screen time in it and yet apparently that is enough to ruin the whole film!

Gotta love one powerful lady.

tags: try and grow out of it
or at least learn to shut up.
summary: Reminder to the Trollboys out there that no one takes you seriously when it comes to your hate on Captain Marvel because of how...
body:
Reminder to the Trollboys out there that no one takes you seriously when it comes to your hate on Captain Marvel because of how pathetic most of your arguments are.

Also, Brie Larson is so much better than you people - and that’s without her even trying to be. Then again, it really isn’t all that hard to be better than you.
